text:
*[Bug 18825] Improve tools::pkg2HTML accessibility*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18825>

Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |seb.meyer@fau.de

--- Comment #1 from Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) ---
Only commenting on one of the side issues:

(In reply to Lluís from comment #0)
Checking "Rd metadata" already warns about duplicated aliases on different help
pages since "forever", but duplicates in a single Rd file are silently dropped,
also since a very long time. So in r87414, I have fixed
`Rd2HTML(standalone=FALSE)` as called by `pkg2HTML()` to drop these too.

From a quick check, more than 300 CRAN packages have within-file duplicates. In
principle I agree that it would be useful to NOTE these, but the standard Rd
tools have long coped with them, so I think priority is low.

) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |seb.meyer@fau.de

text:
*[Bug 18800] Defining R_NO_REMAP_RMATH and calling Rf_*() results in compiler errors*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18800>

--- Comment #3 from Martin Maechler (<mailto:maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch|maechler@stat.math.ethz.ch>) ---
Thank you, Mikael.  
These changes in your patch (attachment 3430) are the relatively quick and easy
ones,
and I think that's all we'd need for now.

The ones that will/would need more (both careful and tedious) work are those in
the WRE manual, i.e., in file `doc/manual/R-exts.texi` :

In the introduction to [6.7  Numerical
Subroutines](<https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-devel/R-exts.html#Numerical-analysis-subroutines>)
 we now (in R-devel !) have

>   If `R_NO_REMAP_RMATH` most of these will need to be prefixed by `Rf_`: see the header file for which ones.

and that is still correct.
I have not heard of any plans to make `R_NO_REMAP_RMATH` the default behavior
e.g., for C++, 
as it was for the recent switch to `R_NO_REMAP`.
But if we would be go in that direction, we'd need to overhaul that  `@section
Numerical Subroutines` in `doc/manual/R-exts.texi` (i.e. the source of WRE).

text:
*[Bug 18825] Improve tools::pkg2HTML accessibility*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18825>

--- Comment #2 from Lluís (<mailto:lluis.revilla@gmail.com|lluis.revilla@gmail.com>) ---
Thanks, for the quick look and patch. The change in r87414 is indeed very
minimal and one I should have explored. But apologies because I didn't use the
right word and I have mislead you.

Let me explain with an example, the package BuildSys:
Currently, it has no NOTES on CRAN [1], but checking it with WCAG2.2 tools
reports a warning:

>The <code> element has the id \"initProjectFromFolder_+3A_defines\" that is already in use

There is a help page with both
[DEFINES](<https://github.com/cran/BuildSys/blob/62a9b9cd3353029e060aa3b37802736ea27e725d/man/initProjectFromFolder.Rd#L100>)
and
[defines](<https://github.com/cran/BuildSys/blob/62a9b9cd3353029e060aa3b37802736ea27e725d/man/initProjectFromFolder.Rd#L78>).
As the arguments are converted to the ids after converting them to lower case,
this leads to having two sections within the same id. 
The id is not from the \alias{} but from the arguments names. 
`tools::checkDocFiles` checks for "duplicated entries in the arguments section"
but apparently not case insensitive so I am not sure this is raised/noted
somewhere else. 

This could be a misunderstanding from the package developer or could be on
purpose but in either case a note would help to harmonize argument
capitalization on the same help page.

On the linked comment I suggest using:
object/function_+level_numberArgument_lowercaseArgument, which I think would
involve modifying `writeItemAsCode` or [its
usage](<https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/blob/f078532a40c204336519ecd6db1c39fba4ebc16a/src/library/tools/R/Rd2HTML.R#L1028>).

[1]: <https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_AdvBinomApps.html>
